item.title: SuperMemo Guru
item.description: SuperMemo Guru Reference Piotr Wozniak Creator of Supermemo and popularizer of Spaced repetition memory system and Incremental reading. 大神的网站。 [[Thoughts Memoh 汉化组]] 重点翻译来源之一。
